### Equations
```{r}
# temperature
sims = 201
temps <- rep(NA, sims)

temp_fun<- function(T, x){
  temp = min((T*x)/100, T)
}

for(i in 0:sims){
  temps[i] <- temp_fun(5, i)
  }
```

```{r}
# economic activity
K <- rep(NA, sims)

econ_fun <- function(temp, B = 0.05){
  K = exp(-B*temp^2)
}

for(i in 0:sims){
  K[i] <- econ_fun(temps[i], i)
  }
```

```{r}
# consumption
C <- rep(NA, sims)

con_fun <- function(K, x, g = 0.01){
  C = K*exp(g*x)
}

for(i in 0:sims){
  C[i] <- con_fun(K[i], i)
  }
```

```{r}
# Utility
U <- rep(NA, sims)

u_fun <- function(x,n = 0.5){
  U = (C^(1-n))/(1-n)
}

for(i in 0:sims){
  U[i] <- u_fun(C[i])
}
```

```{r}
# Discounting
r <- function(d=0.005, n = 0.5, g=0.01){
  r = d + n*g
  return(r)
}

r <- r()
```
